org.coniks.coniks_test_client

Class SignatureOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_test_client.SignatureOps

  • public class SignatureOps
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all operations involving digital signatures that a CONIKS client must perform.

      • verifySigFromDSA

        @Deprecated
public static boolean verifySigFromDSA(byte[] msg,
                                  byte[] sig,
                                  java.security.PublicKey pk)
        Deprecated. Replaced with Signing.dsaVerify(DSAPublicKey, byte[], byte[]).
        Verifies msg and the sig using the DSA PublicKey pk
        Returns:
        true if the signature is valid, false otherwise.

      • signDSA

        @Deprecated
public static byte[] signDSA(byte[] msg,
                        java.security.interfaces.DSAPrivateKey prk)
                      throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Deprecated. Replaced with Signing.dsaSign(DSAPrivateKey, byte[]).
        Signs msg using DSAPrivateKey prk
        Returns:
        the signature or null on an error
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
